entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
